def_cn: (房屋等)不太大的，不算昂贵的，普通的
def_en: A modest house or other building is not large or expensive.

def_cn: (数量、比率或改进程度)不太高的，适度的，适中的
def_en: You use modest to describe something such as an amount, rate, or improvement which is fairly small.
If you say that someone is modest, you approve of them because they do not talk much about their abilities or achievements.

def_cn: (女性或其衣着)端庄的，保守的;(行为)正派的，检点的
def_en: You can describe a woman as modest when she avoids doing or wearing anything that might cause men to have sexual feelings towards her. You can also describe her clothes or behaviour as modest .
